text: Sam Aronson at 2012 signing of Riken-BNL agreement renewal Sam Aronson is an American physicist, formerly President of the American Physical Society in 2015 and also formerly the Director of the Brookhaven National Laboratory from 2006 to 2012. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:21st-century American physicists
title: Sam Aronson
